title: BMAT08
reasons_remedies: Accepted Blister sensed in Rejection bin. a. Check if accepted blister are falling in rejection bin.

text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMAT08
Error Code 08
Category: BMAT
Title: BMAT08
Alarm Message: Accepted Blister in Rejection Bin
Reason & Remedy:
1. Accepted Blister sensed in Rejection bin. a. Check if accepted blister are falling in rejection bin.
2. Trims falling in rejecton bin. a. check if trims is falling in Rejection bin, adjust rejection shute to avoide trims.
3. Sensor faulty input . a. Follow below teaching procedre to adjust the sensor range.
Visual References:
- Camera System Location
